Reviews from Your Friends
24 reviews in English
Review from Jordan W.
7 friends 44 reviews
Jordan W.
Herndon, VA 6/6/2012 8 Check-ins Here I love Chick-fil-a, their food is probably the most delicious, flavorful, and consistent available in a fast food joint. This location is consistent with the Chick-fil-a experience found round the country.
As mentioned in my check-in tip, I love the availability of the healthier grilled chicken nuggets at no additional cost. Excellent for those watch calories, fats, or carbs but still wanting a high protein meal that is cheap, quick, and convenient. Additionally, with the grilled nuggets being remarkably healthy, if you order the combo with fries and unsweetened tea you can have a decent meal for under 650 calories.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Dan L.
1 friend 24 reviews
Dan L.
Sterling, VA 5/21/2012 I suffer from Chickfilaitis, a condition where i only crave ChickfilA on Sundays. Anyways, i usually get the grilled chicken sandwich and enjoy the mustard that comes with it. Also, I like trying their shakes and different sauces to go with the waffle fries. The only thing about this location is it's a mess sometimes trying to get out if there during a busy time.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Mac J.
2 friends 8 reviews
Mac J.
Ashburn, VA 12/21/2011 Great place! This is the Cadillac of Fast Food restaurants.
I love this place. People are friendly and polite. I love that when I say "Thank You!" I always get a "My Pleasure" as an answer. I love that the bathrooms are always clean. I love that employees help carry my tray to my table when my hands are full. I love that occasionally my kids get balloons and stuffed cows. I love that the chicken nuggets seem to be made of . . . get this . . . chicken ! ! !
Was this review…?
Useful (2) Funny (1) Cool (1)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Chris C.
19 friends 81 reviews
Chris C.
Broken Bow, OK 4/28/2012 1 Check-in Here A clutch spot if u need to get the kids outta the house but put in minimal effort. Quite hectic during peak hours (lunch, dinner) but overall a solid spot.
Was this review…?

Review from Randall M.
8 friends 37 reviews
Randall M.
Sterling, VA 2/29/2012 The only complaint I have, is that sometimes that the wait is long. Staff has always been very friendly.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Mike A.
2 friends 16 reviews
Mike A.
Ashburn, VA 9/27/2011 This is what fast food should be. Real food. Polite employees. Clean store. Tasty. Best milkshakes ever. I cannot beleive that I am giving a fast food restaurant a 5*.
Don't miss the breakfast bagel with egg and cheese and chicken. Wow!
Was this review…?
Useful (2) Funny Cool (1)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Leah C.
2 friends 9 reviews
Leah C.
Sterling, VA 2/21/2012 Everyone knows Chick-fil-A has amazing food, but this particular Chick-fil-A has outstanding staff. Like all Chick-fil-A's, they always respond with "My Pleasure" when you thank them for something. The manager is extremely kind and has walked around to people's tables asking them how their dining experience has been. They also have very friendly staff who ask whether you need refills or for your trash to be thrown away. This past Christmas, this location allowed me and my friends to hold a bake sale and sing Christmas carols outside of their restaurant in order to raise money for African missions projects. Not a lot of restaurants allow things like that, and it made a huge impact on my loyalty to this particular location. They get my business often! :)
Was this review…?
Useful (1) Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Christen M.
14 friends 3 reviews
Christen M.
Sterling, VA 8/26/2011 Give the company a royal bow for honoring a long tradition of service to the customer with basic happiness and courtesy. It's so refreshing to see people who are happy to be working and remember that DOING a good job is always more important than HAVING a good job. Thank you! And it's nice to get a movement of the classic car and bike during the summers to encourage people to get together outside and check out the hot rods and crotch rockets!
Was this review…?
Useful (2) Funny Cool (1)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Christine T.
5 friends 127 reviews
Christine T.
Sterling, VA 2/28/2011 I looove Chick-fil-A, the waffle fries are excellent, the people are quick and very friendly. They always kindly accommodate my order of just a little bit of ice in my sweet tea.
I haven't had anything on the menu that I haven't liked. I have to admit I'm also a fan of the cow in the costume. :-)
Was this review…?
Useful (1) Funny (1) Cool (1)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Susan J.
Elite '12 14 friends 104 reviews
Susan J.
Alexandria, VA 1/10/2012 I love pretty much all chick fil as. They speak English, are polite and always get your order correctly. Plus their chicken is amazing, waffle fries are delish and Polynesian sauce is yummo. They are even gracious when getting your free drink refill. The best fast food chain hands down!
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Gabrielle O.
4 friends 9 reviews
Gabrielle O.
Ashburn, VA 1/19/2012 Great food for a fast food place. The quality of the food I would compare to Red Robin. (It's not great food but for fast food that's awesome!) My chicken sandwich wasn't like a nasty processed patty like at McDonalds. It was thick and juicy. Great prices too!
Was this review…?

Review from Angie L.
Elite '12 89 friends 141 reviews
Angie L.
Monroeville, PA 5/15/2011 1 photo 1 Check-in Here I love chickfila's food and will always be a fan. There is no other fast food like this and the staff is always friendly (as in ALL chickfila locations).
My favorite is mixing the sweet tea with lemonade!
Was this review…?

3 friends 17 reviews
Jim S.
Long Beach, CA 2/26/2012 just meh- all processed chicken yuck

Review from Lester K.
186 friends 109 reviews
Lester K.
Centreville, VA 1/26/2010 *** I would like to preface by saying that any racial views and observations below are in no way meant to be racially nor stereotypically negative. Any traces that may show through my words are the result of having achieved a level of vocabulary comparable to a newly born infant of a cavecouple that has lived their entire lives in isolation from society in the cavernous caves if Northeastern Wyoming. No cows or children were hurt during the writing of this review ***
Five stars for this Chick-Fil-A.
Some people think it's a waste to review chains. I disagree. Yes, chains carry the same items for the most part, and some food establishment chains may also get cooked/frozen/packaged from corporate kitchens and warehouses. However, service, cleanliness, and the quality of these precooked/preprocessed foods differ from store to store. Employees differ, which is an important note because they are the face of the franchise at that moment in time.
As this is only the 2nd Chick-Fil-A that I've been to, I can't say how all other locations are. But gosh darn it if this isn't the absolute best fast food chain establishment that I've ever been to.
Every time I get into the parking lot or drive-through line:
- I can't help whistling the "Leave it to Beaver" song in my head - This leads to self conversation between Beaver, June, and Eddie Haskell - My mood gets better - My belly seems smaller - My wii-wii seems bigger
All this happens every time I come here, which is during lunchtime when this place is *ALWAYS MASSIVELY PACKED*. There's no avoiding the huge crowds here during weekday lunchtime.
Every employee I've been in contact with or even just seen has been super duper nice. Always a smile on their face. Truth be told, it creeps me out a little how nice everybody here is because, in this day and age, it's rare to see people even act that happy while working. Kinda like Southern hospitality had a baby with Midwest values.
They all do their jobs with commendable pride, which is sadly lacking in every other fast food chain that I've been to. They all genuinely look like they're happy working there. That's a little creepy too.
On top of that, the vast majority of the employees here are white. I'll say it again: the vast majority of the employees here are white. And the 2 Latinas that I saw were behind the counter. The Asian lady was the order-put-togetherer. The white employees were cleaning the tables, taking out the trash, handing out samples of fruit parfait, etc. AND they looked happy doing it.
You know what? Even my food always tastes "nice". Like June Cleaver nice. And happy. Like gay, but not gay as in gay, but gay as in happy. I guess it's like the belief that well cared for animals produce better meat due to the lack of bad toxins that reside in animals that are scared or stressed all the time. I don't think anything beats an Original Chicken Sandwich with 3 packets of high-fat mayonnaise. Or a Chicken Club with 3 packets of mayonnaise. Or the chicken nuggets dipped in 3 packets of mayonnaise. I wish portion size was a bit bigger, but I'm not gonna further complain as long as the service doesn't change.
I swear, coming here is like therapy. It's like I come here for douchebag detox. Because of the employees, I can't help but to be nice myself. And smile a little bit more. Like what I said about whistling and feeling happier and feeling skinnier, that feeling stays with me for the rest of the day. I even think that any bad tensions between people can be cured by some douchebag detox at this Chick-Fil-A.
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++­++++++++++
Shit. I read Nick E.'s review after I wrote mine. I should have just plagiarized
Was this review…?
Useful (20) Funny (30) Cool (18)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Nick E.
5 friends 41 reviews
Nick E.
Falls Church, VA 6/24/2009 Many people might not think that fast food joints deserve props on Yelp, but I have to review based on experience and service. The Chick-Fil-A in Sterling next to Lowe's near the Dulles Town Center Mall is one of the most exceptional fast food restaurants that I have ever experienced. Food quality and order accuracy is always wonderful. The employees are extremely courteous, well mannered and speedy. Even if the store seems a bit busy when you first enter the door, you will be served much faster than you would expect. The store is always kept very tidy and clean.
This is one of the few businesses where you'll walk away thinking that the people working there actually like their jobs and enjoy their work. Strange isn't it?
Was this review…?
Useful (4) Funny Cool (3)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Benson B.
0 friends 13 reviews
Benson B.
Miami, FL 9/20/2011 Forget the fact that this place is a fast food restaurant. The service is always, always excellent every time we've eaten there.
Their chicken strip and waffle fries are tastier than the chicken from the other fast food places in the region.
Their staff is always friendly and helpful. Great place for kids.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool (1)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Gene W.
58 friends 328 reviews
Gene W.
Washington, DC Updated - 8/12/2010 2 photos Plays upbeat and positive Christian music in the morning. A great start of the day.
The chicken biscuit is delicious and the tater rounds are different from other fast food chains. Fruit cups are outstanding!
Service always with a smile. Sit down restaurant at fast food prices. Love it!
And when you say, "Thank you!", the employees reply, "My Pleasure!" Now that's a sign of respect and good management training! :)
Was this review…?
Useful Funny (1) Cool (2)

1/9/2010 I love great food fast and Chick-fil-a is great food fast. The chicken is fantastic. The food is… Read more»

Review from Tuan N.
11 friends 560 reviews
Tuan N.
South Riding, VA 6/22/2011 Can't ever go wrong with this place. I love their waffle fries and the sauces are great too.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool (1)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Scott L.
Elite '12 7 friends 297 reviews
Scott L.
San Francisco, CA 2/1/2011 What can I say, but I love Chick-fil-A. The food is always good and fresh and the people are always fast and friendly. I really like the spicy chicken biscuits and sandwich and love their waffle fries. This location seems very well run and they seem to hire good people to work at it. They even had people offer to refill me drink while they were out cleaning tables. How's that for service at a fast food restaurant? I only wish they had a Chick-fil-A closer to where I live so I didn't have to seek them out when I travel.
Was this review…?
Useful (2) Funny (1) Cool (1)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Matthew G.
0 friends 17 reviews
Matthew G.
Sterling, VA 5/8/2009 I don't really go to McChristian a lot. And I am certainly not one who would give fast food spots high ratings.
The food here is decent. Not worth the 4 stars I gave, but still pretty good.
What earned this Chick-Fil-A a 4 star rating from me was the demeanor and pleasantness of the staff when I visited. The manager was very friendly with us when we ordered. Moreover, I witnessed one of the employees nicely ask an elderly patron who was eating at a table if he would like a refill on his drink. I was impressed with that, and so was the elderly patron.
Was this review…?
Useful (3) Funny (1) Cool (2)
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from jen p.
0 friends 23 reviews
jen p.
Fairfax, VA 12/22/2010 Oh my gosh! They have the most PLEASANT people working the drive thru. I have never experienced more efficient and friendly people at any other food place. Based on this and the fact that I am obsessed with their lemonade and the delish waffle fries with my choice of yummy dips, they get 2 thumbs up from me!
If I HAVE to complain about anything, it is just a personal thing - sometimes the chicken on the sandwich is a little too plump, which kinda creeps me out. But the all important pickle usually overshadows any doubt I have!
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool

Review from Kelly K.
Elite '12 80 friends 762 reviews
Kelly K.
Washington, DC 10/16/2010 1 Check-in Here I am a fan of the chicken breakfast sandwich on a biscuit. Fast service.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Becky J.
0 friends 2 reviews
Becky J.
Fairfax, VA 7/7/2010 Chick-fil-a is great to begin with, but the one in Sterling/Dulles by the Lowes is superb! A few weeks ago my boygriend and I used the drive-thru there for lunch. Three employees were waiting outside at the entrance with reflective vests on, which worried us at first. Turns out their speaker system was out of service so they were taking orders in person. One girl showed us a laminated menu and we just pointed at what we wanted. She spoke it through her headset and immediately had the price ready for us. We drove on to the pick up window and our order was waiting for us! Fastest service EVER. They had the drinks filled and lidded and all the food in the bad along with straws and napkins before we could even drive up (and we were the only car in line). Phenomenal.
Before we even got home, my boyfriend had called their customer service number to compliment the service there. We were genuinely impressed.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review Comment from Bill D. of Chick-fil-A 7/28/2011 «Hide I just wanted to thank you for using our drive thru and for… More» I just wanted to thank you for using our drive thru and for the kind remarks here on Yelp. Weather permitting, we try to take orders outside in the summer in person during lunch to help make it personal and improve order accuracy. I hope we'll see you again. We might be using a hand held device this year that can receive a credit payment outside to make it even more convenient. Flag this comment Review from Jerry J.
0 friends 4 reviews
Jerry J.
Sterling, VA 9/16/2011 this is one of the best fast food places i have ever been to. i don't know if i can even call it fast food. i had a large order and it was for carry out. took about 5 min to get it ready. and they offered to help carry it to my car. great place and recommend to ever one!!!!
Was this review…?

Write a Review What's This? About This Business Provided by business Specialties
Hand spun milkshakes, fresh squeezed lemonade, fresh brewed iced tea, hand breaded chicken entrees, freshly prepared garden salads, breakfast menu, hand made biscuits for breakfast
History
Established in 2002
We open for business on March 28, 2002. See www.chick-fil-a.com for more about Chick-fil-A.
Meet the Business Owner: Bill D.
My wife, Anne and I, met at Chick-fil-A in 1984. We have owned and operated Chick-fil-A Restaurants since 2001. We have seven children, we homeschool and raise many kinds of farm animals. We hope you will introduce yourself when in one of our restaurants to get to know us better. We woud love to meet you. Thank you for your support.
